segments.text: I notice the boy is really struggling to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on his tiptoes, trying to get just one more cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, looking up at him with such hope in her eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face as he stretches higher and higher.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I'm afraid he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is just pouring out, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice the water before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy finally grabs a cookie and hands it to his sister.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so happy to finally get her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they can get down safely without their mom noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR
